"Dear compatriots, the situation that Venezuela is going through is known and worrying," @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"Above all rights, above ideological or political positions, life is sacred and untouchable ...", @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma
"... the death of human beings is a fact that we must regret and reject energetically", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"It does not stop worrying us also the amount of political prisoners", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"Democracy is one in which problems are solved with dialogue between all actors ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"The best mechanism for this is direct democracy, for the leaders it should be the last word", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"We express our respect for the self-determination of peoples and non-interference", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/CPf9W8C3vJ
"Our deep solidarity with the Venezuelan people ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"... our deepest desire that they will soon reach peace and that no more blood will be spilled.", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"You are witnesses of the efforts of the Government in the fight against corruption ...", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/VaU0ArZBrR
"... this is everyone's task, let's not lower our guard", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"I remember now that my mother used to say:" The closer you are to the truth, the more nervous the guilty get, "#ElGobiernoInforma
"In Sigchos I commented that I am very worried because I saw the poor state of many health centers", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"I have arranged to @Salud_EC be undertaken in a sustained plan of sensitive improvement of the centers ...", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/rfB5qWKwQ0
"We will recover the vocation of the doctor of yesteryear, the doctor with whom we felt in good hands", @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma
"Soon we will have the neighborhood doctor", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"Strengthening of the comprehensive public health network ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma https://t.co/iq4S80HVqT
"... so that the institutions that provide this service, work in a coordinated manner", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"We have to take advantage of, or improve, the existing infrastructure", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"Everyone, without exception, we must be treated with quality and warmth", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"For this, we are going to make a deal for the good treatment. I repeat, a deal for good treatment ", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"I commented my concern for the number of children and young people, who have to travel enormous distances ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"... to access schools and colleges. Some have transportation difficulties and others travel through roads in poor condition ", #ElGobiernoInforma
"We are designing an integrated education system in the territory, so that every educational unit ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"... regardless of its size or location, have that quality education", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"For this, pedagogical or logistical support will be provided to the units that require it", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"Those units that need it will be strengthened and all the requirements will be met ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"... that ensure a quality education, during a lifetime", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
"We offered that we would take care of and support each one of you from birth until God decides to close our eyes" #ElGobiernoInforma
"Today we launched" Impulso Joven ", which is our policy towards youth ...", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma https://t.co/6zJiZcOLoL
"... destined to attend, motivate, train, strengthen, empower and protect these new entrepreneurs in the country" @Lenin #ElGobiernoInforma
"Welcome, dear young people, to the construction of our country! We continue to meet! ", @Lenin Moreno #ElGobiernoInforma
